name: Burg_263
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues with Island Creole influence
rituals tied to imported reagents and barter
constraints: no instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents or special labors
navigational auguries cannot replace charts or seamanship
notes: Population data sparse; location likely coastal waypoint
Useful as a resupply/black-market stop for nearby sea routes
